title: Gold Bow
summaries: The Gold Bow is a strong type of bow crafted using Gold Bars, and is one of the strongest types of ore bows before one is able to obtain Demonite or Crimtane. It is the counterpart to the Platinum Bow, yet is beaten by it in power and speed. Its sole purpose is to fire arrows from a distance at enemies and deal damage to them.

Its best modifier is Demonic, as it does not have any knockback and thus cannot get modifiers that affect it. It can also get the Deadly modifier, which, while the Demonic modifier may provide the greatest damage per hit, grants a higher increase to the overall DPS.
